law.catch_line: The Commissioner may issue an order that directs a dental plan organization or its representative to...

text.section: The Commissioner may issue an order that directs a dental plan organization or its representative to cease and desist from engaging in an act or practice that violates this subtitle.

section.section: Within 20 days after service of the cease and desist order, the dental plan organization or its representative may request a hearing to determine whether a violation of this subtitle has occurred.
A hearing under this subsection shall be conducted in accordance with § 2-213 of this article and is subject to judicial review in accordance with § 2-215 of this article.
